noun.description: A person who does not have an existing criminal record or who has not attracted the attention of police or security forces.
examples: intelligence officials have been concerned for some time about the threat posed by cleanskins

noun.description: An animal that has not been branded with the owner's mark.
examples: Delacy began the trapping and branding of cleanskin cattle

noun.description: A bottle of wine whose label does not identify the producer, typically sold at a low price.
examples: Steve bought a cleanskin ($16) from the local tavern
